description: A free, powerful, reliable and flexible plugin that allows you to create PDF files to be downloaded, opened or printed by your user's browser and/or save the PDF to your database. It is completely client-side, uses no API, no external services and does not increases your app's costs. Read the forum thread for instructions!
instructions: Use the plugin actions in a workflow to create the pdf and finish it with a download, print or open pdf action.
name: PDF Conjurer
